participant_1.background:
I'm always there for my friends and family.
i drive more than an hour each way to work.
i have one grandson and one daughter.
my car is over 20 years old.
I do not see my family very often, but I am close to them.

participant_2.background:
I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
I have a close relationship with my mother.
i have long red hair.
I brush my teeth and get ready for work while my kids get dressed for school.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.

content.text: Hi, it's nice to meet you. What's your name?
Hi! I'm participant_2, it's nice to meet you too.
Same here, participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and listen to music.
Cool, me too! What do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite books?
Some of my favorite historical fiction books are The Pillars of the Earth, Shogun, and The Name of the Rose.
Those are all great books! I've read them all.
Oh, cool! We should talk about them sometime.
What do you like to write?
I like to write short stories and poems.
Cool, me too! I've been trying to write more poetry lately.
That's great! I'm always looking for new people to share my writing with.
Me too! We should exchange some of our work sometime.
